729515f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Northfield Avenue
729515f-a.text:
3308 Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.W. corner
of Northfield Avenue. It was the home of John Decker, a
Virpinia oysterman; also an oyster planter in Prince's Bay.
September 28, 1924
By Wm. T. Davis through P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729515f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Northfield Avenue, Staten Island, NY

729516f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Northfield Avenue
729516f-a.text:
331u Richmond Terrace, south side, west of North-
field Avenue. The house belonged to J. B. Palmer in 1898
and to W. M. Armstrong in 1907. The view is westward.
September 25, 1931
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
729516f-a.folder: Richmond Terrace & Northfield Avenue, Staten Island, NY
